title: Campus parking
question: Oh, so, if I need to drive to Academia Sinica, how do I get there?
answer: Oh, ah! If I want to drive to Academia Sinica, I must first go to the General Affairs Office website to download the parking permit application form. After filling it out, I will contact the unit window for stamp approval, and then submit it to the General Affairs Office for application. After approval, I will be notified separately to collect the parking permit and pay the fee. If I forget to bring my parking pass, I have to pay a toll of NT$200 before I can enter the campus. If I use an expired pass, I have to wait until the day after the expiration date

title: Campus parking
question: Oh, I have to go to work at Academia Sinica today, but I haven’t paid my dues yet, what should I do?
answer:
Oh, okay! If you haven’t paid your parking fee, don’t worry! Just go to the General Affairs Office website to download the parking permit application form, fill it out and contact the unit window for stamp approval, and then send it to the General Affairs Office for application. After approval, you will be notified to receive the parking permit and pay the fee. If you have an emergency, you can report it directly to the police station or police station, and they will handle the case on a case-by-case basis.

title: Campus parking
question: I have to go to Academia Sinica for a meeting today, but my motorcycle is not parked in the designated place. What should I do?
answer:
Rest assured I will answer your questions. According to the vehicle traffic and parking regulations of the Academia Sinica campus, motorcycles are not allowed to pass in the campus unless they are official vehicles, police cars, disabled vehicles or emergencies. Therefore, motorcycles are not allowed to be parked in the hospital area without prior application and approval.

To solve this problem, it is recommended that you take public transportation (such as buses) to a station near the Academia Sinica campus, and then walk to the gate of the campus

title: Dormitory information
question: Are you curious about the location and transportation options of the dormitories for newly recruited students? Do you want to check it out?
answer: Please take a look! The dormitory for newly recruited students is located at No. 12, Section 1, Yanjian Road, Nangang District, Taipei City. It is about a 5-minute drive from Nangang MRT Station. There are Nangang Exhibition Hall, Nangang Software Park, Taipei Fine Arts Museum and other attractions nearby. In terms of transportation, you can take the MRT to Nangang Station, or take the bus to Nangang Software Park Station or Nangang Exhibition Hall Station, both of which are very convenient. If you need further information, you can inquire through the organizers of each central dormitory.

title: Dormitory information
question: I heard that dormitories for newly recruited students can be transferred to other types of dormitories. Is this true? You can check the relevant regulations.
answer:
According to the description, newly recruited students can borrow dormitories at any time within 5 years of their arrival, but they can only borrow single-room and multi-room dormitories once each. That is to say, those who borrow new single-room dormitories cannot borrow new single-room dormitories after moving out. However, they can still borrow new multi-room dormitories within 5 years of arrival.
There are conditions for borrowing dormitories for newly recruited students.

title: Dormitory information
question: Why can’t those newly hired single-room dormitories be able to borrow new single-room dormitories after moving out? You can check the relevant regulations.
answer:
According to Article 9 of Academia Sinica Dormitory Management Key Points, newly hired researchers can borrow the newly hired student dormitory at any time within five years of taking office, but they can only borrow single-room and multi-room newly hired student dormitories once each. In other words, those who borrow a newly hired single-room dormitory cannot borrow a new single-room dormitory after moving out.

Article 5 of the Academia Sinica dormitory fee standard also stipulates that the borrower should pay relevant fees while borrowing the dormitory.

title: Dormitory information
question: I heard that the dormitory does not provide furniture, appliances and other equipment. Is this true? Can
answer: Yes, according to the text, newly hired researchers can borrow the dormitories of newly hired researchers at any time within 5 years of taking office, but the dormitories do not provide furniture, appliances and other equipment. Please apply for dormitories through the official documents issued by the dormitory organizers of each center.

title: kindergarten
question: How many classes are there in total in the private kindergarten affiliated to Academia Sinica in Taipei City?
answer: According to the description, there are 4 classes in private kindergartens in Taipei City, with 30 children in each class. Therefore, there are a total of 120 children in the Taipei City private kindergartens affiliated with Academia Sinica.

title: kindergarten
question: What age groups are there in each class?
answer: According to the regulations of Taipei Municipal Kindergarten, the age groups of children in each class are: the small class is 3 years old to under 4 years old; the middle class is 4 years old to under 5 years old; the large class is 5 years old to under 6 years old; the mixed-age class is 3 years old to under 6 years old. Therefore, there are about 30 children in each class, ranging in age from 3 to 6 years old.

title: kindergarten
question: At what time does the park announce the recruitment of new students each year?
answer: OK! According to the announcement of the Taipei City Private Kindergarten affiliated to Academia Sinica, the kindergarten announces the recruitment of new students in small classes and mixed-age classes in late April every year.

title: kindergarten
question: Does it only accept children aged 3-6 years old? Or are there other admission requirements?
answer:
According to the regulations of Taipei Municipal Kindergartens, are they only open to children aged 3-6 years old? The answer is "no". According to Taipei Municipal Kindergarten regulations, kindergartens only accept children aged 3-6 years old, but there are other admission requirements, including:

*Student age: The enrollment age announced by the Taipei City Education Bureau for each semester shall prevail.

*Registered in Taipei City: Children must be registered in Taipei City to be eligible for admission.

*Special abilities: Kindergartens also accept children with special abilities, but they must

title: kindergarten
question: What does it mean to calculate the enrollment of full-year children by their school age?
answer: According to the regulations of the Education Bureau of the Taipei City Government, the enrollment age for children admitted to private kindergartens in Taipei City is the entry age for each semester. Therefore, when the Taipei City Private Kindergarten affiliated to Academia Sinica enrolls new students in small classes and mixed-age classes, the enrollment age is based on the enrollment age. Entry age for young children. In other words, children who are 3-6 years old when they enter school in late April each year can enroll in school.

title: kindergarten
question: https://kinder
answer: According to the regulations of the Taipei City Private Kindergarten affiliated with Academia Sinica, the kindergarten has a total of 4 classes: small class, middle class, large class and mixed-age class. Each class accepts 30 children. In late April every year, it announces the recruitment of new students for small classes and mixed-age classes. The enrollment target is children aged 3-6 years old. The enrollment of full-year children is calculated based on the student age (based on the age of admission for each semester announced by the Taipei City Education Bureau). The URL is https://kindergarten

title: Academic Activity Center
question: It’s so strange, why can Academia Sinica employees book rooms at exclusive discounts?🤔
answer:
Employees of Academia Sinica are entitled to room reservations at in-hospital rates. This preferential price is a unique benefit of Academia Sinica and is not exclusive. Academia Sinica is considerate of its employees and provides room rates that are better than market rates, allowing employees to have a more comfortable accommodation environment. This preferential price is applicable to Academia Sinica employees and their dependents, and non-employees are not allowed to use it.
